info.name: tricorn zooms
info.description:
Some interesting spots on the tricorn a.k.a. Mandelbar set, using the mapping z -> z*^2+c.
Equivalently, the generalized Mandelbrot set for the para-complex numbers, the unique symmetric composition algebra of dimension 2 over the reals.
